snippet: Fitch’s lower outlook showed how fragile Britain’s economic recovery remains and is likely to give ammunition to the opposition Labour Party.
abstract: Fitch warns Britain could lose its top AAA investment grade rating because its economy might not be flexible enough to absorb economic shocks; lower outlook is likely to give ammunition to the opposition Labour Party.
lead_paragraph: Fitch’s lower outlook showed how fragile Britain’s economic recovery remains and is likely to give ammunition to the opposition Labour Party.

headline.seo: Fitch Warns Britain It Could Lose AAA Rating
headline.main: A Warning to Britain Over its Economy
headline.print_headline: Fitch Warns That Britain Faces Losing AAA Rating

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject
